label.phrase: the memory of the terror weighed on people's minds no one could believe that stalin had really gone for good there was scarcely a family in moscow that had not suffered in some way from persecution yet no one ever talked about it i for instance would never talk about my experiences in the camps in front of my friends and they never asked about it the fear was too deep-rooted in everyone's minds
